name: Ov
content:
Ov was a Trandoshan who, by circa 19 BBY, had became a member of a group of Believers on the planet Genarius, under the command of Alina Impeveri.
Despite not being a Force-sensitive, Ov wanted to become a Jedi. The Trandoshan wore Jedi robes that had been looted from a Jedi corpse, and obtained a lightsaber. Ov practiced lightsaber techniques with fellow Believer Squick.
